Title: Increases the designation of certain offenses relating to unlawfully fleeing a police officer and makes such offenses eligible for bail
Summary: Increases the designation of certain offenses relating to unlawfully fleeing a police officer and makes such offenses eligible for bail.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to increasing the designation of certain offenses relating to unlawfully fleeing a police officer and making such offenses eligible for bail
